# travis-with-repo

[![Build status][travis-image]][travis-url] [![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]

> A module with a travis file and repo

## Installation

Install `travis-with-repo` using [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/):

```bash
npm install --save travis-with-repo
```
